metadata.description: The name of the Storage Account. This has to be a unique name across Azure, up to 24 chars long, and all lowercase.
The name of the Storage Account to use for storing the diagnostics logs. This cannot be a Premium Storage account and has to be a unique name across Azure, up to 24 chars long, and all lowercase.
A unique string that is used as the suffix in the VM name. This helps differentiate between different VMs created as part of this template.
The user name of the administrator of the new VM. The following names cannot be used: 'admin','administrator'.
The password for the administrator account of the new VM when authenticationType is 'password'.
